mapper.sql: meeting_id, meeting_name, meeting_record, meeting_time, meeting_place, meeting_host, meeting_state
mapper.insert: insert into cpb_meeting (meeting_id, meeting_name, meeting_record, meeting_time, meeting_place, meeting_host, meeting_state) values (#{meetingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{meetingPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingState,jdbcType=INTEGER})

meeting_id,

meeting_state,

mapper.update:
update cpb_meeting
meeting_name = #{meetingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meeting_record = #{meetingRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meeting_time = #{meetingTime,jdbcType=DATE},
meeting_place = #{meetingPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meeting_host = #{meetingHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meeting_state = #{meetingState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where meeting_id = #{meetingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
